item.name: direct_access_forbidden
item.string: Direct access of this file is forbidden. This file is used for this websites API system.[br /]To unprotect this file, uncomment out

item.name: download_no_get
item.string: Please do not directly access this page. This page is to be used when linked to.

item.name: file_no_accesskey
item.string: This file also does not have a secret accesskey, so it is not possible to access this page.

item.name: new_install_welcome
item.string: This website's configuration has not yet been created. This will result in a website that does not function correctly.[br /]To install your website use the installer package included in the JArD package.[br /][br /][b]Warning: [/b]It does not look like you have an install directory uploaded.

item.name: download_no_exist
item.string: The file requested does not exist or encountered an unknown error. Please try again later.

item.name: api_lockdown
item.string: This website has been set to [dotted]LOCKDOWN_MODE[/dotted]. This means all PHP scripts using the JArD API are disabled.

item.name: mysql_connection_error
item.string: Something has gone wrong with the MySQL server's connection with %/FRAMEWORK/%. Maybe trying to refresh this page will help?

item.name: db_connection_error
item.string: Oops, it looks like the connection between the mysql server and the mysql database went terribly wrong!

item.name: wrong_password
item.string: Sorry the password you have entered does not match the username entered.

item.name: unknown_username
item.string: Sorry the username you have entered does not match any of them in our database.

item.name: profile_created
item.string: Your username and other account details have been added to our database. You may not login both game and forum using your login details.

item.name: profile_deleted
item.string: Your profile has been deleted. This will mean all your posts will not show up as being posted by you and you will no longer be able to login with your old login details.[br]If you wish to reverse this change, we have already sent you an email with all the information you will need to get your account back.

item.name: banned_warning
item.string: We are sorry, but your account has been banned from logging into our login server(s). For more information we have sent an email to the email you registered with, with all the info you may need to know about the reason of your ban.

item.name: muted_warning
item.string: Just before we throw you to the main site, we would just like to say that you have been muted from the forum and %SITENAME%. This mute will expire on the %MUTE->EXPIRE%. You will still be allowed to use the private message system, but no public messages or comments from you will enter our database.
